docs.abstract: The Upshot; polls indicate Republican presidential candidate Sen Ted Cruz is rising in Iowa, with two polls showing him in second place; data does hint, however, that he lacks support outside of rising base of 'very conservative' voters.

docs.lead_paragraph: There are reasons to believe the Paris negotiations are different from previous failed efforts, but an agreement would hardly halt global warming.
docs.snippet: There are reasons to believe the Paris negotiations are different from previous failed efforts, but an agreement would hardly halt global warming....
docs.abstract: Guide to climate talks in Paris, which Pres Obama and over 100 world leaders are attending in hope of crafting accord to address global warming and its effects, highlights what is at stake in sessions; two previous such negotiations have failed, but veterans of two decades of United Nations efforts express hopes that Paris summit meeting could result in deal that staves off some of more destructive effects of climate change.

headline.print_headline: As Climate Risks Rise, Talks in Paris Set Stage for Action
headline.main: Paris Deal Would Herald an Important First Step on Climate Change
